name: vk-all-in-one-expansion-unit
description: This plug-in is an integrated plug-in with a variety of features that make it powerful your web site. Many features can be stopped individually. Example Facebook Page Plugin,Social Bookmarks,Print OG Tags,Print Twitter Card Tags,Print Google Analytics tag,New post widget,Insert Related Posts and more!

scripts.update: ncu -u -x 'gulp gulp-autoprefixer' && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.lint:block: npm run lint:cta && npm run lint:child-page-index && npm run lint:contact-section && npm run lint:page-list-ancestor && npm run lint:sitemap-page && npm run lint:sns
scripts.lint:cta: wp-scripts format inc/call-to-action/package/block/ && wp-scripts lint-js inc/call-to-action/package/block/ --fix
scripts.lint:child-page-index: wp-scripts format inc/child-page-index/block/ && wp-scripts lint-js inc/child-page-index/block/ --fix
scripts.lint:contact-section: wp-scripts format inc/contact-section/block/ && wp-scripts lint-js inc/contact-section/block/ --fix
scripts.lint:page-list-ancestor: wp-scripts format inc/page-list-ancestor/block/ && wp-scripts lint-js inc/page-list-ancestor/block/ --fix
scripts.lint:sitemap-page: wp-scripts format inc/sitemap-page/block/ && wp-scripts lint-js inc/sitemap-page/block/ --fix
scripts.lint:sns: wp-scripts format inc/sns/block/ && wp-scripts lint-js inc/sns/block/ --fix
scripts.build: npx gulp text-domain && npm run build:block && npx gulp build
scripts.zip: npx gulp dist && cd dist && zip -r vk-all-in-one-expansion-unit.zip vk-all-in-one-expansion-unit

author: Vektor, Inc.
